DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , pilot phase I trial study whether phone email reminder increase vaginal dilator use patient endometrial , cervical , vaginal cancer undergo brachytherapy . Brachytherapy type internal radiation use radioactive material place directly near tumor kill tumor cell . A reminder program may help increase use vaginal dilator decrease long-term side effect follow brachytherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Phone Email Reminder Increasing Vaginal Dilator Use Patients With Gynecologic Cancers Undergoing Brachytherapy
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate whether vaginal dilator adherence improve additional reminder phone call and/or email reminder survey . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate whether difference length vaginal canal non-intervention intervention group . Evaluate rate gynecologic , urinary , gastrointestinal toxicity . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 3 arm . ARM I : Patients receive additional reminder . ARM II : Patients receive reminder email survey every 2 week 1 year complete radiation . ARM III : Patients receive reminder email survey Arm I 4 additional phone call 4-8 week , 3-5 month , 7-8 month , 10-11 month first year follow-up . After completion study , patient follow 10-14 week , 5-7 month , 8-10 month , 11-13 month , 15-17 month , 19-21 month , 23-25 month post treatment .
DOC.criteria: Patients gynecologic cancer undergo vaginal brachytherapy part treatment Patients previously receive pelvic external beam radiation brachytherapy . Patients may enrol undergoing vaginal brachytherapy radiation treatment .
